name: ConnXus
tag_list: supplier-diversity, diverse-suppliers, minority-business, small-business, mwbe, procurement, purchasing, supplier
overview:
connXus.com is a revolutionary online service that connects diverse and small businesses with companies seeking to expand and diversify their supplier base.

connXus.com makes it easy and affordable for companies to locate, evaluate and engage performance-rated small, minority- or woman-owned businesses across more than 100 spend categories including construction, legal, facilities, information technology, professional services (accounting, consulting , training, etc.), capital equipment , manufacturing, transportation and temporary labor.

At connXus.com, small, minority- or woman-owned (MWBE) businesses register as supplier members by creating a profile that indicates the categories of products or services they provide, company size, industry expertise, representative customers and other relevant information. They can then request performance ratings from prior customers that link back to their profiles via the proprietary connXus.com rating system.

Corporations register as buyer members and include the categories of products or services they need in their profile. The connXus.com system then actively matches buyers with suppliers that fit their needs based on both profiles. Buyers can also conduct searches for performance-rated small, minority- or woman-owned suppliers or post contract opportunities for suppliers to submit bids.
